<<<<<<< HEAD
An ansvver to a lawless pamphlet entituled, The petition and articles exhibited in Parliament against Doctor Haywood, late chaplain to the Bishop of Canterbury. By R.M. R. M.
[2], 21, [1] p.
Printed by I. N. for Henry Seile, at the Tygres head in Fleetstreet, over against Saint Dunstans Church, London : 1641.
A response to: The petition and articles exhibited in Parliament against Doctor Haywood, late chaplain to the Bishop of Canterbury. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======
